page.title: 18LIFE-STYLES contd.
page.content: Today, the people in the area are no longer dependent on the local mills for their work: some people continue to work at the variety of small businesses in the Glasshouses and the New York Mills,but the majority of the other people are professionals who work in Leeds, Bradford, Harrogate and many other large towns or cities, or they work on the farms or in the local sevice industries. Most people have at least one car, and a few have two, but there is a regular bus service from the village to Pateley Bridge and Harrogate, at the weekend there is a bus to Grassington,on a Thursday there is a coach to Ripon for the shoppers, on a Monday a bus goes to Otley market and two local coach companies make many local,nationwide and European trips.
